quote.quote: Do the dead frighten you

subtitle.subtitle: Do the dead frighten you

quote.quote: Your dead men seem to have moved camp Will

subtitle.subtitle: Your dead men seem to have moved camp

quote.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

subtitle.subtitle: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon

quote.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

subtitle.subtitle: sentence you to die

quote.quote: You did well

subtitle.subtitle: You did well

quote.quote: Do you understand why I did it

subtitle.subtitle: You understand why I did it

quote.quote: A freak

subtitle.subtitle: Its a freak

quote.quote: Thats a direwolf They grow larger than the other kind

subtitle.subtitle: Its a direwolf

quote.quote: Theres not been a direwolf sighted south of the Wall in two hundred years

subtitle.subtitle: There are no direwolves south of the Wall

quote.quote: There are five of them

subtitle.subtitle: Now there are five

quote.quote: There are five pups

subtitle.subtitle: There are five pups

quote.quote: Three sons two daughters The direwolf is the sigil of your House Your children were meant to have these pups my lord

subtitle.subtitle: The direwolf is the sigil of your house

quote.quote: Three sons two daughters The direwolf is the sigil of your House Your children were meant to have these pups my lord

subtitle.subtitle: They were meant to have them

quote.quote: You must train them as well

subtitle.subtitle: You will train them yourselves

quote.quote: Easy to say and harder to do I will not have you wasting the servants time with this If you want these pups you will feed them yourselves Is that understood

subtitle.subtitle: You will feed them yourselves
